DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate performance INTRALASE® , laser keratome creates corneal flap , compare mechanical microkeratome ( Amadeus™ ) . Our hypothesis difference 2 device .
DOC.criteria: Candidate bilateral wavefrontguided LASIK Myopia 7.00 D Astigmatism 0.00 1.50 D History ocular pathology Previous ocular surgery Very large pupil ( great 8mm diameter , infrared measurement ) Thin cornea ( preoperatively calculate minimal residual bed < 250 um ) Irregular astigmatism Asymmetric astigmatism Unstable refraction Any criterion precludes subject undergo LASIK
